text: Mario Grech (born 20 February 1957) is a Maltese Catholic prelate. He has been the Secretary General of the Synod of Bishops since 2020. He was the Bishop of Gozo from 2005 to 2019 and Pro-Secretary General of the Synod of Bishops from 2019 to 2020. Pope Francis made him a cardinal on 28 November 2020. Grech was born in Qala, Gozo, on 20 February 1957. Grech is widely seen to be papabile in the 2025 papal conclave following the death of Pope Francis. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Catholic Hierarchy: Bishop Mario Grech Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:Maltese people
